Name: Ajay A
Title: Nice Beach
Review: Nice Beach near to Thiruvanmiyur. Quite neat and evenings are more good to visit. Have some street food options as well.

Name: Pradeep J
Title: It's nice and fun
Review: It's an famous beach in Chennai and it's has world famous church near. It's all lots Street food there.

Name: Munna Prasad
Title: Chennai's Best Beach with awesome food
Review: Also known as Elliot Beach but since it's near the residential area of Besant Nagar, it is also called Besant Nagar Beach.It is accessible by private and public transport but private vehicle is advisable as there is good parking fascility (weekends it's very crowded).There lot of accommodation options nearby the beach.There is a famous Church Annai Velankanni Shrine and Shri Ashtalakshmi Temple. Temple is very crowded on Tuesdays and Fridays.The famous broken bridge is also nearby this beach which is worth a visit only during daylight as it is not safe in the darkThe beach is very clean and well maintained, it is very safe as well. Best time to visit would be either evening or early sunrise.There are many activities to do such as skating, merry go round, shooting the balloons. Eateries like Murugan Idli, KFC, Wow Momo, etc

Name: Salomon R
Title: Beautiful place
Review: One of the best place to visit in the evening with your loved ones. Peaceful ambience with some shore restaurants.

Name: Balamurugan D
Title: Soul searching and peace beaches
Review: Best beach experience and activities like balloon shooting and well maintained one. It also has Mcdonalds, Murugan idly shop and sooperstar pizza shop.

Name: Anmol Katiyar
Title: Best beach in Chennai city.
Review: This is the best beach within the city of Chennai (far better than Marina). Beach is clean enough to take a stroll in the evening (but not worth bathing). Also, there are lots of restaurants in the vicinity of beach.

Name: Sunnywin
Title: great beach
Review: Great beach for people watching and catching the sea air in the evenings, lovely place for a stroll.

Name: M B
Title: Must see
Review: The weather was amazing when i visited the beach, the beach has a lot of eateries around it, be it local or well established brands, the beach in itself isn't very clean, but better than many that i have seenDo visit in the evenings or early morning!

Name: Vinay
Title: Beasant Nagar Beach
Review: It is one of the more cleaner beaches in Chennai. The stalls are on the beach spreading dirt and waste produced is spread on the beach. The people throw the paper wrappers etc on the pavements, roads inspite of dustbins placed for the same.Most of the cafes in and around the beach are very small.

Name: Sathish
Title: Wonderful beach to visit
Review: It's one the best and wonderful beach to visit with family and friends during weekends and in special occasions to have fun and enjoyment.

Name: megu
Title: Peaceful beach
Review: Talking about Besant Nagar Beach it is the chennai biggest and crowded beach of the state. The beach is very good and every year people from country and outside tourist comes to this beach to have fun with family and friends. The travel convince to the beach is very good and once can easily reach there. The accommodation and hotel and also present and nearby to the beach area and once can easily find a hotel in their budget. The local sightseeing is done with the help of local guides and individuals. Talking about the safety the safety measures are quite good developed at that area.

Name: Rakshith R
Title: Nice beach
Review: Nice beach to spend time with family and friends...also theres an elliott memorial here...very good to go in the early morning or evening times...

Name: Mr. Kumar
Title: Great cleanness Great ambience
Review: Great place to visit with family and friends it's very much cleaned and well maintained place. best time to visit in early morning or in evening.....

Name: Abhijit verma
Title: Nice and clean
Review: Very nice and clean beach , you can have a long nice walk in evening,good eatery and restaurant are in vicinity. Very nice shopping lane also there where you can pick up something trendy .

Name: Radhaharish B
Title: Marathon
Review: The beach has everything to spend time with your friends and family. I visited this beach at mornings and evenings also. I felt that the ambience at beach surroundings is more lively in evenings than mornings. Good place to spend time and explore the local feeling

Name: Vikram Pandian
Title: Decent beach - good to hang around with family
Review: Pleasant and neat place for families and kids. This location is always crowded in the evening and weekends. Lots of food options as well starting from street food to branded food shops. Evening time is the best time for all to enjoy this place.

Name: Sreya Reddy
Title: Beach
Review: Pleasent at night times on full moonday with good view where the waves were too harsh that we cant getin to. In the evening,it is good to chill yourself with some vendors around with seafood,entertainment games,horse ride,... it is not much crowded..that is the best part for the peace lovers

Name: San
Title: Beautiful but rough
Review: The beach is beautiful but it tends to be pretty rough for the most part. There is also the Shrine to our Lady of Health were people cone from mikes around to pay homage. It is a Roman Catholic Church but people from all denominations visit it.

Name: Rohini
Title: Decent beach
Review: You can find a decent beach . Neat platform to walk .parking area crowded. Better for early morning walk and view of sun rise.

Name: Ronak Gada
Title: One of the cleanest
Review: That was my first reaction. The beach is definitely one of the cleanest beaches I've seen. There is sufficient parking available for 2 and 4 wheelers. The eateries are located on 2 ends of the beach which makes it easier to maintain the cleanliness. There are bins located everywhere so that one does not litter. Beware of hawkers who tend to force you to buy things from them.The only downside is that there is no public restroom nearby which makes it difficult incase there's an emergency with the child.

Name: AjitV
Title: Family Chinese restaurant
Review: Great family Chinese restaurant... Enjoy your favourite fried rice and chilli chicken gravy... Don't miss the dragon chicken, chilly beef, fried ice here.... Great service, friendly and courteous friends who make you feel at home...

Name: Immanuel R
Title: Best place to timepass
Review: Nice time to have fun on Sundays fresh fish üêü stalls especially Jenifer fish stall you get good and fresh fish made of home made masala

Name: Cigin Kuriakose
Title: Lovely beach
Review: Clean, compared to Marina. Good eateries on the shore side. Also called Eliot's beach, it have a memorial monument on the beach sand itself.

Name: K V K
Title: Besant Nagar beach
Review: Besant Nagar Beach, fondly known as Bessie, also called as Elliot's beach is located in Besant Nagar, Chennai, India. It used to be  the end-point of the Marina Beach shore. But now  the beach shore line has extended  far beyond. This beach is named after Edward Elliot, who was the chief magistrate and superintendent of police of erstwhile Madras. The  Velankanni Church and the Ashtalakshmi temple are right on the beach shore. The Karl Schmidt Memorial named after a Dutch sailor who lost his life in the process of saving others from drowning is a very prominent landmark on this beach.Elliot's Beach is one of the cleanest and safest beaches in the city of Chennai  and is an extremely calm and tranquil place. It  is ideal for long walks.  For people who want to soak their feet in the splashing sea water and lose themselves completely in the arms of the nature, this is the place.

Name: YogeshGarg
Title: Very Dirty beach
Review: It is very dirty beach, fully crowded and you will not found any place to sit and enjoy, of you are beach lover it is no where.

Name: KARTHIKb87
Title: Chennai's one of important beach
Review: Its one of chennai important beach after Marina beach and we can visit and enjoy here. on seashore famous Ashtalakshmi temple siturated.

Name: Balz H
Title: Feel and enjoy typical local scene
Review: Enjoy an afternoon and catch the life of locals. Watch how fishermen bring and sell fresh seafood. See and talk with families having a day off. Enjouy this typical  local scene during sun set.

Name: moorthyns
Title: Relax in besanthnagar beach
Review: A nice place to visit and relax with children....pass ur time in the beach with hot and spicy bajjis and chaat items....

Name: AURELIO L
Title: nice place
Review: to see the beach is nice ,it s a way to see another side of the town,don t miss too much time but take a look at the beach

Name: Bibhu_PB
Title: Cleanest Beach
Review: Elliot‚Äôs Beach is a famous place to visit with friends or family. A pleasant and neat place for families and kids. This location is always crowded in the evening and weekends. Lots of food options as well starting from street food to branded food shops. Evening time is the best time for all to enjoy this place.

Name: AartiShankar
Title: Beautiful beach
Review: We have visited this beach N no of times and it's our go to place. It's beautiful and clean. Kids can freely play around. They have a huge giant wheel and few games for kids and families. You get corn, sonpapdi and other yummy treats. It's definitely a must visit place to unwind and relax.

Name: George Georgiev
Title: Incredible place
Review: The Breeze will was away all the smells and you will have beautiful time there, it is a nice place to get a walk, and take a dynamic rest.

Name: Parkins Daniel
Title: Fun with Friends
Review: This place is close to my heart. We have spent lot of time with friends. This place is surrounded by lot of shop and restaurants. We have a church and temple near by.

Name: ArpanPahm
Title: Very famous spot
Review: This is very famous and popular picnic spot to visit. I was there at evening time. Good location. I seat in beach area and enjoyed.

Name: drgarodia
Title: Clean and tidy
Review: Coming from Mumbai, first thing I noticed was cleanliness about this beach. Lots of activities to do and stalls to eat. Overall a good place for outing.

Name: Parth
Title: Its very nice.
Review: Very peaceful atmosphere  wonderful people... very nice food also... there are so many rides for kids also there.......

Name: Kani1710
Title: Great evening at the beach
Review: This is more quieter beach compare to Marina. Had lot of activities and rods for kids and adults. Great eateries at walkable distance from the beach car Parker, which was great for us when traveling with young kids. The only problem is that if you drive yourself... little hard to find parking.

Name: Punch-77
Title: Good to get some fresh sea breeze in the evening
Review: Many residential apartments, shops and restaurants have sprung up in the last decade and this makes the beach crowded. But it is being maintained to match the population challenge.

Name: sathish
Title: Besant nagar beach
Review: Awesome. Stress reliever. If anyone get angered, please go to there. It is really awesome place. This is the first visit of me. Seasore are neat than marina beach

Name: Vinodkumar G
Title: Beach view is awesome , but very crowded in the evening
Review: We went besant nagar beach by auto from our hotel. At the entrance of besant nagar you will find more restaurants to hang out.Beach view is awesome ,but it was very crowded when we reach at 5.30pm , it was about to sunset and we enjoyed fabulously reddish sky touching the sea

Name: satheesh
Title: Posh sister of Marina
Review: Now it had become synonymous with a posh lifestyle and the attraction had diverted from the beach to the restaurants

Name: seninthillu
Title: Serene beach
Review: Besant nagar beach is one of the important beaches of Chennai.This beach is supposed to be one of the cleanest beaches with a vast sand area.Just adjacent to this beach is Besant nagar which is one of the posh living areas of the city.There is a lovey walking track for the regular walkers.Quite a lot of famous eateries are there.The Velankanni church and the Ashtalakshmi temple are nearby.The serene feeling one gets in the beach makes you to visit the beach often.

Name: #amosamiyanayeküéß
Title: #üåä
Review: quit small compare to marina beach but nice and attractive place govt has provided WiFi as well as lots of food items available to byte

Name: Navin Kumar Askaran
Title: A great beach for the young crowd and old.
Review: This small beach is a nice place to unwind with friends and family.Over the years it‚Äôs become commercial but still retains its charm and tearfulness.The eateries and shopping around it are fun.

Name: Swami1939
Title: A CALM PLACE TO REWIND
Review: The Besant Nagar Beach in Chennai is a nice place to spend your evenings with family, Friends and children. This place is less crowded when compared to other beaches in Chennai. The traffic in this area is less. You can relax and  try a few eatables available in and near the place.

Name: Maria
Title: Calm and clourful
Review: This the best beach in Chennai. It is very clean and evenings are very pleasant. Kind can also visit the Lakshmi temple next to the beach.

Name: Subra
Title: Clean but could be cleaner
Review: My aunt used to stay here..so memories from 1980s are fresh in mind. Today it looks like it needs a lot of cleaning - and looks so crowded and commercial. Hey it was still fun!

Name: Anu
Title: Nice place to spend an evening
Review: Spend an evening with kids here. Many eating places and stays here. Burger man in very good and the corner shop as well. Quality is not bad.

Name: lakshmimenon
Title: A visit to the beach
Review: I and my children had a wonderful time at the beach.It was so soothing,the wind kept us to move forward easily,we could breathe in fresh air,everything was perfect.All of us enjoyed this trip very much.

Name: bipdish
Title: Cleanest & most happening beach in chennai
Review: Besant nagar beach is undoubtedly the best beach in chennai. The most happening  & good for family with children because there are a lot of activities for them.

Name: Srinivas P
Title: Keeping up fine
Review: Still an iconic beach Lots of crowd in the weekend. Plan your parking ahead. Paid parking on the beach road. Side streets are free if you can find a spot. The corporation of Chennai is doing it's best to clean it and the vendors are doing their best to keep the corporation busy.

Name: NnKk
Title: Beach
Review: This is the second most popular beach in chennai. More frequented by the south Chennai people. Relatively smaller than the marina beach. But full of activity. I wish the authorities took away the vendors on the beach. Restore it to its old beauty.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Far from city but good and peaceful
Review: Its one of the must visit temples in Chennai. Love to visit the beach again  and again. Its a bit far from the city but like the beach very much.

Name: kungfupanda
Title: It's not a friendly place to go with children.
Review: The place is so dirty, who knows what kind of diseases you may get from here. I once saw a local guy pooped on the shore  early morning .It's better to go marina beach which is more beautiful and bigger than this. Dont recommend to anyone.

Name: Sai B
Title: Nice Beach
Review: Its a nice beach, but little crowded during weekends, if you visit during week days its good. But its not well maintained now a days. the sea water smell is horrible some times

Name: Himanshu A
Title: Garbage and plastic
Review: Garbage and plastic is thrown all over the beach. Litter is all that you will find in the beach. Marina beach is cleaner so do not waste your time at bessy.

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Small beach in city
Review: It is a small beach in the city but the environment maintained is clean. All the top level people's visits this beach and its most famous for the broken bridge Food essential outlets were available here

Name: Sathya
Title: Nice beach
Review: Never venture during weekends. Horrible crowd. Nice beach with food walkway and no ice restaurants and shopping areas

Name: Anu
Title: Small beach - not crowded
Review: Wonderful Beach. I had loads of fun for about 2 hrs and headed back home.Feel relaxed and calm. A good place to be.

Name: RoadToSky
Title: Average beach - very crowded
Review: When you go this beach, be ready to cross the way full of stinking fried fish. There is not much space there as it is over crowded and parking can also be an issue.

Name: Mukeshkahna
Title: Not much spl
Review: Beach is big but heavy crowd,notuch likable. Hope local crowds may like. It was my intrst to see...okkk

Name: Rajeshkumar C
Title: Visit to Besant nagar beach
Review: In life there are few things which make me more  than happy . I love being with nature and in particular I love to spend time in beaches with some nice music or a good book. My favorite holiday spot is beaches.Being in Chennai the biggest advantage is proximity to beaches , Marina beach, Besant Nagar beach, Tiruvanmiyur beach and so on..More than Marina beach I prefer to go to Elliot's beach since it is less crowded and cleaner than Marina beach. Marina beach is more commercial and Besant Nagar beach gives more privacy...This beach is more for the people those who prefer to be away from the commercial things and crowded space. This beach is a great boon for the localites to spend time. Most of the crowd is from local residential areas. Also lot of volunteer meets happen in this place in the weekends

Name: G Muralitharan
Title: Family Beach
Review: It is not so good sand and crowded during week ends. Children can enjoy little. Corn fry and sundal available. Compare to Marina this beach  Eliiots is ok.

Name: Dr P Nagaraj
Title: Nice Weekend Hang out
Review: It‚Äôs a nice weekend hangout beach Expecially with friends to Have calm beautiful wind as well loving the nature

Name: The nomad couple
Title: Lovely little beach
Review: If you bored or frustrated with the crowd in marina this is your go to beach. Not very rushed in a weekday. We had a great time enjoying in the water and the children enjoyed playing the small games close by.Lot of eateries around.

Name: Karikalan S
Title: Morning evening invariably a fabulous place to visit
Review: good for morning walk and evening walk. An excellent evening outing for the travellers and the whole family. It's unfortunate off late the skyline and the sea line is changing due to too much of commercial exploitation and it is pathetic the government agency is a silect spectators. The local corporators are the worst culprits. Still thanks to the police patrolling and the conscious local citizens are doing their best to preserve.With all odds the place is an excellent destination for the activity, for a breeze or for short eats and for spend time.

Name: psp
Title: nice place
Review: one of the place to hangout in chennai...very clean n over crowded during weekends...morning walk in this place was excellent, pleasure,  calm n enjoyable...

Name: AMUTHA KUMAR
Title: Great experience
Review: Neet beach Good for health Long walk and variety of spicy hotels at beach side Small rides Happy moments Super beach experiences

Name: lashmi menon
Title: Very nice beach
Review: Very nice beach in Chennai after marina beach it was fantastic  place u will different  types  of food and best kulfi will be thre it was best one with lots of nuts i seriously  recommend  it just 25 rupees or something  bt best one

Name: Samah
Title: Beach
Review: Among all the beaches, this beach has a little classy road, it‚Äôs not overcrowded near the water because there are many restaurants around this area is more know for the food walk near the beach it‚Äôs a clean beach and is very peaceful! There are so many options for food.

Name: Rangakumar
Title: Relaxed, destressing
Review: Marina beach has become crowded, Besant nager is not yet crowded you can go and have a dip on the beachfood also we have options form KFC to veggies pizza to panipoorisspring potato to gola icenice place to walk along with kidsgood to walk along the sea bed on the sandany time nice place, day time for secret couples....

Name: Cyrus
Title: Very nice for evening visit
Review: I went here with my family. Place is good, nice beaches very clean compared to other beaches in Chennai. Will get lot of street food to eat.

Name: Gairik M
Title: A pleasing experience
Review: I visited there on the evening of 17.8.2019. Compared to the Marina beach, it's smaller and crowded. However, the waves and the sea-breeze had a soothing effect. We enjoyed various food items being sold at the beach.

Name: Vanisha Krishnananthan
Title: Very dirty beach
Review: Extremely messy beach, lots of rubbish everywhere. Perhaps some rubbish bins might encourage a bit of civic consciousness . It‚Äôs lovely with games n restaurants but the cleanliness was not there

Name: Sanjay S
Title: Very nice beach front to stroll
Review: Visited this beach in the evening at around 7 pm. Nice place to stroll and relax. Plenty of snack stalls around. Had dinner at KFC right in front of the Beach road.

Name: Nish_Wish
Title: Better than Marina beach anyday...
Review: Quieter Calmer and more relaxing beach with better Cafe and overall ecosystem. Enjoyed our time there

Name: sathish
Title: Besant Nagar Beach - Best place to spend with families and friends
Review: It's one of the best place to spend weekend evenings with families and friends. It's has lot of fun filled places around the beach. We have many number of game options like gun shooting, ring throw around the beach. We have many varieties of local food available such as, popcorn, curly potatoes, mojito, colas, fish items such as prawn, crab, squid at reasonable rates. Bajji stalls are available in large numbers around beach, which is very famous here. We have varieties of rattinams available for both kids and adults. Horse riding is also available at reasonable rate. We also have commercial hotels and pubs around the beach which is bit costly. Overall it's a must place to visit for great fun.

Name: TravelDiaries_Pulkit
Title: As good as Marina!
Review: If you liked Marina, you will like this one as well. Ensure that you go during good weather, you will like the walk. Good places around as well.

Name: Gopi T
Title: Best in Chennai
Review: Comparing to marina Beach the water was clean and the beach was well organized when you visit in Chennai don‚Äôt miss out .before you go to Marina Beach visit here.Even in the night time you can play it‚Äôs a very good place for team outing.

Name: Mukund R
Title: Always relaxing
Review: On a slightly windy day it's best to sit and enjoy the waves crashing down. Lots of small eats available around.

Name: sundarjagalan
Title: Best in  chennai
Review: This place gives you full entertainment in the field of cinema. Good ambience, sound and cleanliness is also good.

Name: Sunil
Title: What a walk near the beach
Review: Very nice place to chill out especially in evening. Just you need to sit and relax and enjoy the ocean view .You get many things near by beach, cafe and other few restaurants.

Name: Singhan S
Title: Great place for walk
Review: Had a nice morning walk along the beach to refresh and get energetic. The soup being served on the roadside was simply ecstatic.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: This one of the cleanest beaches of Chennai
Review: We had been to this beach several times and enjoyed playing and bathing in the water. Though we always used to travel by bus. Really nice beach üèñ unlike mareena Beach it's clean and you won't find much fish üê† smell here. Bus facility is very close there is a bus depot in Besant Nagar. So you reach most of the places easily.

Name: Deadman17
Title: Smaller but peaceful
Review: This beach is smaller than the more famous Marina Beach, but is much more peaceful, given that very few people visit it. the place is ofcourse not very clean because of the low attraction of tourists. Still one can easily take a nice walk along the beach peacefully. Would suggest people to go here if Marina beach is not for you.

Name: satyajitjadhav
Title: Good place to visit
Review: Good place to visit with family but need more cleanliness. Nice place to spend some evening time. Snacks stalls are available.

Name: idea614354
Title: Good to see
Review: this is a one best place to enjoy beach in chennai,   very big and good one. many movies are shooted in this.

Name: Rakesh
Title: A Great Early Morning Beach!
Review: Also known as the Edward Elliot‚Äôs Beach, it is good beach in Southern Chennai. The length and breadth of the beach is much small compared to the famous Marina beach. But, it is more peaceful and cleaner than Marina because fewer people visit and there are fewer food vendors and sellers.Garbage and littering can be seen here and there but still is less compared to the larger Marina.Early morning hours is recommended.

Name: jayakumar
Title: Great place but unclean place
Review: This place can be very organized and can offer disciplined clean practices by placing trash bins. Stall offer spiral potato where the sticks are potential risk to feet as these hidden objects in sand can get into your feet

Name: Mitesh Bhandari
Title: A Must Try For Anyone who visits Chennai
Review: This is on of the most popular beaches of Chennai. the area has some amazing restaurants and also local eat outs. With family/friends its the best place t kill time or get peace of mind. Sunday Mornings are usually "Car Free Sundays" here, and the best place for your morning walks.

Name: DSKTraveller
Title: For a relaxing evening or morning
Review: Unlike the Marina beach, the Besant Nagar Beach or Elliots Beach is more clean but shorter. Located in a slightly posh area, the Elliots Beach is a good place for morning and evening walk or a family outing. While the Marina offers hot bajjis and snacks, the road to Elliots is dotted with a variety of restaurants where you can have dinner. Some of these restaurants have seating arrangement in the open which goes well with the breeze. You can explore restaurants serving south Indian, tandoori and continental dishes. Sunday mornings are usually car free times so you can actually park your vehicles elsewhere and walk on the road along the beach sands. You also get to play games or participate in group activities during those few hours. Overall it is a less crowded beach and you can combine your visit here with shopping in the nearby showrooms.

Name: kovaiRavindran
Title: The Ugly Beach
Review: Once in my childhood this beach was a familiar one to me and no crowd was here comparing with Marina Beach.But now this Beach also condemned by the crowd.

Name: CK T
Title: Not as crowded as Merina Beach, very pleasant and comfortable.
Review: The beach is not as wide as Merina Beach, but you still have the same ambiance and easy access to the restaurants along the beachside. There is fish market nearby and a very grand church. Nice place to spend during the evening with the sea breeze.

Name: arnabc_iitm
Title: Shortest beach of Chennai
Review: Most of the Chennai Beaches are very long. This is the shortest beach and very close to IIT, Adyar. The food court attached with it also serves good food. You can spned a good evening in this beach for sure.

Name: Anjal s
Title: worst
Review: Should nt visit this beach with your girlfriend. Not so good people around. Very untidy all over the beach

Name: muthuvel r
Title: always my favorite beach in the world
Review: for besant nagar is nostalgia.with my friends we used to sit and have lots of healthy discussions.  lots of water have flown through the bridge . lots of changes happened  in and around the beach for last 20 yrs still its one of my favorite. now it has become little busier and commercial .

Name: satheesh
Title: The Posh sister Of Marina
Review: The beach lining with posh restaurants make it a great place to hangout with friends and family .Kids can have plenty of fun.

Name: Darshank
Title: Good beach
Review: When I visited Chennai I had been to this besant nagar beach. It was a good joyful experience I really enjoyed

Name: Ahamed
Title: Peaceful and less crowded
Review: Nice place to visit. It is most pleasant as it is less crowded than marina. There are lots of good restaurants around

Name: fransis
Title: nice
Review: best place to visit . will alwats come back to see this place .. amazing place to have a good time .
